---
title: "tip data"
author: "harvallav"
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(mosaic)
library(skimr)
library(ggformula)
library(crosstable)
```

```{r}
tip <-read_csv("../../data /tip.csv")
tip 
```

```{r}
tip %>% crosstable(Tip~Preferance ) %>% as_flextable
```

```{r}
mosaic::t.test(Tip~ Preferance,data=tip) %>% 
                 broom::tidy()
```

```{r}
tip2 <- tip %>% 
  mutate(
    Preferance = as_factor(Preferance)
  )
glimpse(tip2)
```

```{r}
gf_histogram(~ Tip, fill = ~ Preferance, data = tip)%>%
  gf_labs(title = "TIP v/s PREFERANCE", caption="ggformula")
```

```{r}
gf_histogram(~ Tip| ~ Preferance, data = tip2)%>%
  gf_labs(title = "TIP v/s PREFERANCE", caption="ggformula")
```
